item.title: LiveView for iPhone
item.description: LiveView is great little freebie for UI design & prototyping on iPhone. Essentially it sends a 320x480 viewport from your Mac to your iPhone, so is useful for creating quick and dirty simulations, demos, and user experience prototypes. http://www.zambetti.com/projects/liveview/
